title: 306.08 LANDS TO BE SUBJECT TO RULES OF CEMETERY ASSOCIATIONS.
text: A conveyance by a fraternal corporation may transfer all right, title, and control in the acquired land that is devoted to cemetery purposes. Upon transfer, the public cemetery association to which the conveyance is made acquires and may exercise all of the rights, privileges, and control that the fraternal corporation previously had, and the cemetery and all premises constituting it are subject to the rules of the cemetery association.
